content: a simple open sack i made for my own shopping so i don t have to use the plastic bags in the produce department i like to bring several i m sharing it for free because plastic is bad for the planet my husband who also crochets and knits is helping me tech edit this pattern if you notice anything in error please let me know if hubs or anybody else sends me errors or issues and i update the pattern i ll provide an updated version here as well latest version includes * corrections to bag base lines 3 4 6-9 10 * printer-friendly version on the final page
